title: T206 Abstein $35, T205 Kirb White SP $75 (price drop 2/21)
author: mintacular

posts.post_title: T206 Abstein $35, T205 Kirb White SP $75 (price drop 2/21)
posts.post_content:
Nice Abstein, small area someone erased mark lead to lower grade. No creases. Modest corner wear. Clean Sweet cap back just a bit o/c. $35

[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/nollpm/for-saletrade/3574/t206-bill-abstein[/url]



Kirb White, not really creasing but med corner wear and brown spotting on polar bear back. $75

[url][IMG]http://i434.photobucket.com/albums/qq66/nollpm/t025lotof3-1.jpg[/IMG][/url]

Prices include shipping. PM me if interested.
Any interest in these 2? Added new prices (firm). Thanks, Pat
